description.en:
### Welcome to the Residence with Glory Holes

***The price of rent might be monstrously high, but the benefits are well worth it!***

There are empty rooms that need to be filled, and the only tenants that can fill these slots are virile, young renters who've got lots of stamina, turning their bachelor pad into a sex-filled penthouse!

After giving a new male tenant a discounted rate at an all-female dwelling, a magic portal opens up with the bottom half of the succubus landlady slipping through! She says if he wants to enjoy his discounted rent, he'll need to tend to the needs of all the monster girls who make their home in the building. Fortunately for him, there are magic portals that’ll bring the girls to him–at least, parts of them–and make his job easier. But as he begins to connect with a full-figured demi-dog girl who's loyal to his dick, can he keep up with her demanding libido and the rest of the monster girl residents!? 

1. [Welcome to The Hole-in-The-Wall Dwelling - Moving In & Celebrating With the Landlady](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/welcome-to-the-hole-in-the-wall-dwelling-moving-in-celebrating-with-the-landlady-english) / Kabeana-tsuki Juukyo e Youkoso - Ooya to Nyuukyo Iwai (壁穴付住居へようこそ 大家と入居祝い)
2. [Welcome to The Hole-in-The-Wall Dwelling - Room 304 The Case of Suhara Yoshie](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/welcome-to-the-hole-in-the-wall-dwelling-room-304-the-case-of-suhara-yoshie-english) / Kabeana-tsuki Juukyo e Youkoso - 304-goushitsu Suhara Yoshie no Baai (壁穴付住居へようこそ 304号室 洲原よしえの場合)
3. [Welcome to The Hole-in-The-Wall Dwelling - Room 203 The Case of Kurotani Manami](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/welcome-to-the-hole-in-the-wall-dwelling-room-203-the-case-of-kurotani-manami-english) / Kabeana-tsuki Juukyo e Youkoso - 203-goushitsu Kurotani Manami no Baai (壁穴付住居へようこそ 203号室 黒谷まなみの場合)
4. [Welcome to The Hole-in-the-Wall Dwelling - Room 301 The Case of Serina the Witch Part 1](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/welcome-to-the-hole-in-the-wall-dwelling-room-301-the-case-of-serina-the-witch-part-1-english) / Kabeana-tsuki Juukyo e Youkoso - 301-goushitsu Majo Serina no Baai Zenpen (壁穴付住居へようこそ 301号室 魔女セリナの場合 前編)
5. [Welcome to The Hole-in-the-Wall Dwelling - Room 301 The Case of Serina the Witch Part 2](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/welcome-to-the-hole-in-the-wall-dwelling-room-301-the-case-of-serina-the-witch-part-2-english) / Kabeana-tsuki Juukyo e Youkoso - 301-goushitsu Majo Serina no Baai Kouhen (壁穴付住居へようこそ 301号室 魔女セリナの場合 後編)
6. [The Doll Wants to Play With a Boy](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/the-doll-wants-to-play-with-a-boy-english) / Ningyou wa Onoko to Asobitai (人形はおのこと遊びたい)
7. [However, Monsters Come Out of The Butt!](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/however-monsters-come-out-of-the-butt-english) / Tadashi Mamono wa Shiri kara Deru! (ただし魔物は尻から出る! )
8. [Iubirea de Vampir](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/iubirea-de-vampir-english)
9. [Preventative Sex!](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/preventative-sex-english) / Yobou Sekkshu! ((予防せっくしゅ! )
10. [Daily ★ Dairy ~Extra-Large Portion~](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/daily-bzb-dairy-extra-large-portion-english) / Daily★Dairy: Tokumori (Daily★Dairy -とくもり-)
11. [Welcome to The Hole-in-the-Wall Dwelling - Serina the Witch's Compensation](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/welcome-to-the-hole-in-the-wall-dwelling-serina-the-witchs-compensation-english) / Kabeana-tsuki Juukyo e Youkoso - Majo Serina no Taika (壁穴付住居へようこそ 魔女セリナの対価)
